summary: This is an email notification from Box.com inviting someone to collaborate on a folder titled "Epstein Account Documents." It appears to be an automated system message related to document sharing, likely for legal or investigative purposes.

events.title: Document sharing invitation
events.description: An invitation was sent via Box.com to collaborate on a folder containing "Epstein Account Documents."

locations.address: 1900 Jefferson Avenue, Redwood City, CA 94063, USA
locations.context: Box.com corporate headquarters address listed in the email footer.

keyFacts: An invitation to collaborate on "Epstein Account Documents" was sent via Box.com on October 7, 2021.
The email is an automated notification from the USAfx File Exchange system, indicating official or government-related document sharing.
The sender's email address appears to be Froma<noreplygbox.com>, suggesting it may be a system-generated or forwarded message.
The document references a folder specifically named "Epstein Account Documents," implying financial or account-related records were being shared.
The email footer includes Box.com's corporate address in Redwood City, California.
